name: muyu-tea-fullstack
description: Muyu Tea Website - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DB,Backend,Frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/node_modules frontend/dist node_modules
